Definition at line 72 of file CoordinateSystem.cc.

{
    if (!info.getCoords().size()) throw cRuntimeError("dim = 0");

    os << "< ";
    uint8_t i;
    for (i = 0; i < info.getCoords().size() - 1; ++i) {
        os << info.getCoords(i) << ", ";
    }
    os << info.getCoords(i) << " >";
    if (info.getLayer() != -1)
        os << ", NPS-Layer = " << (int)info.getLayer();

    return os;
}
